A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Horrible horrible movie.
A spit in the face to all Star Wars fans.
Seems like the script was written by blind\, mute monkeys on old\, rusty typewriters... Otherwise I can't explain what what I've seen.
Seems like Spaceballs was a better Star Wars movie than TLJ. In fact\, as much as I hate them\, the prequals where better than this one and at least they added something to the lore instead of just copying the old trilogy (but in a bad way)...
